review: If only it would do VUDU and allow purchased videos in Youtube then I could replace all my other streaming devices in my family room.  To be fair it wasn't advertised to do this and it does well at what it is supposed to do.  Faster than most other devices that do streaming apps (like DVD players and TVs in particular).  People ask how it compares to Chromecast - they are really not exactly the same device.  This is a bit easier to use in some ways and if you are an Amazon + Netflix person that doesn't have a burning desire to send things from your multiple different types of devices you will be very happy with this.  You can supposedly send stuff from Android devices like casting in Chromecast but I can't verify that.The remote is simple and functional.  It seemed to be taking commands from my multifunction remote as well which I will need to explore further in my efforts to reduce the remote clutter in my house.
